page.title: 16 Secondary Education
page.content:
Mr.Fox is the headmaster of{Colyton {Grammar School.}There are 398 pupils, 40 teachers and 23 classrooms. The grounds cover eight and a half acres. Mr.Fox has been headmaster for 10 years at Colyton Grammar but also worked at another school in Hertfordshire for 16 years. 298 pupils come by transport, 50 pupils walk, and 50 pupils ride bicycles. The girls and boys at Colyton Grammar enjoy a varied list of sporting activities. Here are some of them: {GIRLS;}HOCKEY NETBALL SWIMMING ATHLETICS ROUNDERS TENNIS VOLLEY_BALL BADMINTON SQUASH
{BOYS;}RUGBY FOOTBALL BASKET_BALL VOLLEY_BALL SWIMMING ATHLETICS CRICKET
